6075.verse: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا|But will be removed from it|197|380|18197$ٱلْأَتْقَى|the righteous,|113|296|18198$

6079.verse: وَلَسَوْفَ|And soon, surely|130|332|18199$يَرْضَىٰ|he will be pleased.|142|344|14922$

6082.verse: مَا|Not|43|71|262$وَدَّعَكَ|has forsaken you|133|190|18202$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|138|310$وَمَا|and not|71|128|46$قَلَىٰ|He is displeased,|130|158|18203$

6083.verse: وَلَلْأَخِرَةُ|And surely the Hereafter|183|210|10296$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|142|520$لَّكَ|for you|67|121|323$مِنَ|than|50|104|156$ٱلْأُولَىٰ|the first.|81|108|11384$

6084.verse: وَلَسَوْفَ|And soon|97|133|18199$يُعْطِيكَ|will give you|101|173|18204$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|154|310$فَتَرْضَىٰٓ|then you will be satisfied.|190|226|18205$

6085.verse: أَلَمْ|Did not|67|117|348$يَجِدْكَ|He find you|95|195|18206$يَتِيمًا|an orphan|86|186|18159$فَـَٔـاوَىٰ|and gave shelter?|138|188|18207$

6087.verse: وَوَجَدَكَ|And He found you|138|207|18208$عَآئِلاً|in need,|73|211|18210$فَأَغْنَىٰ|so He made self-sufficient.|198|267|18211$

6094.verse: وَرَفَعْنَا|And We raised high|147|238|627$لَكَ|for you|67|249|323$ذِكْرَكَ|your esteem.|107|198|18222$

6097.verse: فَإِذَا|So when|77|173|1730$فَرَغْتَ|you are free,|106|298|18224$فَٱنصَبْ|then stand up.|118|214|18225$

6073.verse: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

6074.verse: Who had denied and turned away.

6075.verse: But the righteous one will avoid it -

6076.verse: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

6077.verse: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

6078.verse: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

6079.verse: And he is going to be satisfied.

6081.verse: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

6082.verse: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

6083.verse: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

6084.verse: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

6085.verse: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

6086.verse: And He found you lost and guided [you],

6087.verse: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

6088.verse: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

6089.verse: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

6090.verse: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

6091.verse: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

6092.verse: And We removed from you your burden

6093.verse: Which had weighed upon your back

6094.verse: And raised high for you your repute.

6095.verse: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

6097.verse: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

6098.verse: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
